questions.question: On January 14, Ericsson Industries purchased supplies of $500 on account. The entry to record the purchase will include

choices.answer: a debit to Supplies and a credit to Accounts Payable.
a debit to Supplies Expense and a credit to Accounts Receivable.
a debit to Supplies and a credit to Cash.
a debit to Accounts Receivable and a credit to Supplies.

questions.question: On July 7, 2017, Anaya Enterprises performed cash services of $1,400. The entry to record this transaction would include

choices.answer: a debit to Service Revenue of $1,400.
a credit to Accounts Receivable of $1,400.
a debit to Cash of $1,400.
a credit to Accounts Payable of $1,400.
once a year.
once a month.
repeatedly during the accounting period.
infrequently in a manual accounting system.
the balances for each account.
information about a transaction in several different places.
a list of all accounts used in the business.
a chronological record of transactions.

questions.question: Buy copier machine for business and finances this purchase with cash and a note. When journalizing this transaction

choices.answer: I will use two journal entries.
I will make a compound entry.
I will make a simple entry.
I will list the credit entries first

questions.question: The entire group of accounts maintained by a company is called the

choices.answer: statement of cash flows.
general journal.
general ledger.
trial balance.

questions.question: The first step in designing a computerized accounting system is the creation of the

choices.answer: general ledger.
general journal.
trial balance.
chart of accounts.

questions.question: The steps in preparing a trial balance include all of the following except

choices.answer: listing the account titles and their balances.
totaling the debit and credit columns.
proving the equality of the two columns.
transferring journal amounts to ledger accounts.

questions.question: A trial balance may balance even when each of the following occurs except when

choices.answer: a transaction is not journalized.
a journal entry is posted twice.
incorrect accounts are used in journalizing.
a transposition error is made.

questions.question: Customarily, a trial balance is prepared

choices.answer: at the end of each day.
after each journal entry is posted.
at the end of an accounting period.
only at the inception of the business.
